name: Chunky Gazpacho and Bean Salad
author: jrwillmer4
summary: Delicious, refreshing gazpacho salad that is best during the summer with fresh vegetables.
ingredients: ½ cup tomato juice, or to taste
1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 (16 ounce) can great northern beans, drained and rinsed
2 stalks celery, sliced diagonally into 1/2-inch-thick pieces
1 large yellow bell pepper, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 large green bell pepper, cut into 2-inch pieces
directions: Peel some strips of skin from cucumber using a vegetable peeler
Cut lengthwise into quarters; cut quarters crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces
Mix tomato juice, oil, red wine vinegar, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl with a wire whisk or a fork
Add cucumber, kidney and great northern beans, tomatoes, celery, bell peppers, and green onions
Cover and refrigerate if not serving right away
